# [Interview #472: TGS Signing Report - Aubree Pham, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=472#7)

#### Question

Who killed Asmodean?

#### Harriet McDougal Rigney

We could tell them, but I think they want to live.
